check.name: DescendantToken
check.description:
Checks for restricted tokens beneath other tokens.

WARNING: This is a very powerful and flexible check, but, at the same time, it is low-level and very implementation-dependent because its results depend on the grammar we use to build abstract syntax trees. Thus we recommend using other checks when they provide the desired functionality. Essentially, this check just works on the level of an abstract syntax tree and knows nothing about language structures.

property.name: limitedTokens
property.description: Specify set of tokens with limited occurrences as descendants.

property.name: minimumDepth
property.description: Specify the minimum depth for descendant counts.

property.name: maximumDepth
property.description: Specify the maximum depth for descendant counts.

property.name: minimumNumber
property.description: Specify a minimum count for descendants.

property.name: maximumNumber
property.description: Specify a maximum count for descendants.

property.name: sumTokenCounts
property.description: Control whether the number of tokens found should be calculated from the sum of the individual token counts.

property.name: minimumMessage
property.description: Define the violation message when the minimum count is not reached.

property.name: maximumMessage
property.description: Define the violation message when the maximum count is exceeded.
